briefTitle: The Clinical Efficacy of Three Oral Hygiene Regimens Using a Manual Toothbrush, Toothpaste and a Mouthwash in Controlling Dental Plaque and Gingivitis
officialTitle: The Comparative Efficacy of Three Oral Hygiene Multi-component Regimens Encompassing the Use of a Manual Toothbrush, Toothpaste and a Mouthwash in Controlling Established Dental Plaque and Gingivitis.

interventions.name: stannous fluoride toothpaste + cetylpyridinium chloride Mouthwash
fluoride toothpaste + fluoride Mouthwash
otherNames: Crest Pro-Health For Me Breezy Mint mouthwash

summary: The objective of this clinical research study is to assess the efficacy of three oral hygiene multi-component regimens encompassing the use of a manual toothbrush, toothpaste and a mouthwash in controlling established dental plaque and gingivitis.
